metadata.description: Number of Zookeeper node (2 is the default)

properties.privateIPAddress: [concat(substring(reference(resourceId(resourceGroup().name, 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', parameters('virtualNetworkName'), parameters('subnetZkName')), variables('virtualNetworksApiVersion')).addressPrefix, 0, sub(length(reference(resourceId(resourceGroup().name, 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', parameters('virtualNetworkName'), parameters('subnetZkName')), variables('virtualNetworksApiVersion')).addressPrefix), 4)), add(parameters('zkClusterIpRangeStart'), copyIndex()))]
